title: Requesting Cloud Support From A Shooting Star
alternative_title: I Would Like to Apply For Cloud Board Support From the Shooting StarRequesting Cloud Support from a Shooting Star!별똥별에게 구름판 서포트 신청합니다별똥별에게 구름판 서포트 신청합니다!
status: I Would Like to Apply For Cloud Board Support From the Shooting StarRequesting Cloud Support from a Shooting Star!별똥별에게 구름판 서포트 신청합니다별똥별에게 구름판 서포트 신청합니다!
description:
Description :
        Two Planet is a moderately recognized small-medium idol group. As the leader and main vocalist, Hee-wook thought things would get better. Even after the team's most popular visual member left and the hiatus period extended due to COVID-19, he consoled himself that everything would turn out well. However, the reality he faced after his military discharge was the disbandment of his team and unemployment. Hee-wook, desperate to hang on to anything, attends a drama audition where he encounters top star Cheon Kyung Seo.Cheon Kyung Seo's first impression, with his rude tone and attitude, was quite terrible. However, Hee-wook finds himself having to align with Kyung Seo after being cast in a friend role.Despite the initial impression, Hee-wook is desperate to make the most of this barely obtained opportunity.+
